TCName.name: verifyDSCReportAllDepartments
TCName.countAllDepartment: select * from sp_wow_article_display_for_dsc_basic ('{"iv_session_id":"","iv_sales_org":"1005","iv_site_no":"3064", "iv_date":"date1", "iv_flag":"UNACTIONED","iv_user_ids":"ALL", "iv_department_ids":"ALL", "iv_article_no":"", "iv_article_barcode":"","iv_barcode_flag":"","valid":"Y","deptNameStr":"All Departments"}') a,zwowc_article_master b,zwowc_article_listing c where a.article_no=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr

TCName.name: verifyDSCReportMultipleReasonCode
TCName.multipleReasonCodeSql: select MATNR,STOCK_CHECK_REASON from saap.LOCAL_WOW_DSC_DRAFTS where ACTIONED_FLAG='N' and CREATION_DATE_TIME = (SELECT CONVERT(date, GETDATE())) and matnr IN ( select MATNR from saap.LOCAL_WOW_DSC_DRAFTS where ACTIONED_FLAG='N' and CREATION_DATE_TIME = (SELECT CONVERT(date, GETDATE())) GROUP BY MATNR HAVING count(*)>1 )
TCName.multipleReasonCodeArticleSql: select MATNR,STOCK_CHECK_REASON from saap.LOCAL_WOW_DSC_DRAFTS where ACTIONED_FLAG='N' and CREATION_DATE_TIME = (SELECT CONVERT(date, GETDATE())) and matnr IN ( select MATNR from saap.LOCAL_WOW_DSC_DRAFTS where ACTIONED_FLAG='N' and CREATION_DATE_TIME = (SELECT CONVERT(date, GETDATE())) GROUP BY MATNR HAVING count(*)>1 ) and matnr='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyDSCReportPartialDepartment
TCName.countPartialDepartment: select * from sp_wow_article_display_for_dsc_basic ('{"iv_session_id":"","iv_sales_org":"1005","iv_site_no":"1108","iv_date":"date1", "iv_flag":"UNACTIONED","iv_user_ids":"ALL", "iv_department_ids":"", "iv_article_no":"","iv_article_barcode":"","iv_barcode_flag":"","valid":"Y","deptNameStr":"All Departments"}') a,zwowc_article_master b,zwowc_article_listing c,zwowc_art_list_department d where a.article_no=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr and c.matnr=d.matnr and d.dept_name in ('deptName1','deptName2','deptName3')
TCName.dscReportValue: select article_no,article_desc,om,soh,sit,lto_details,display_type,stock_check_desc from sp_wow_article_display_for_dsc_basic ('{"iv_session_id":"","iv_sales_org":"1005","iv_site_no":"3064","iv_date":"today_date", "iv_flag":"UNACTIONED","iv_user_ids":"ALL", "iv_department_ids":"45,27,62,28,15,05,20,25,00,10,30,47,55,40,60", "iv_article_no":"","iv_article_barcode":"","iv_barcode_flag":"","valid":"Y","deptNameStr":"All Departments"}') where article_no='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyDSCReportMeatDepartment
TCName.countMeatDepartment: select * from sp_wow_article_display_for_dsc_basic ('{"iv_session_id":"","iv_sales_org":"1005","iv_site_no":"3064", "iv_date":"date1", "iv_flag":"UNACTIONED","iv_user_ids":"ALL", "iv_department_ids":"25", "iv_article_no":"", "iv_article_barcode":"","iv_barcode_flag":"","valid":"Y","deptNameStr":"All Departments"}') a,zwowc_article_master b,zwowc_article_listing c where a.article_no=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr
TCName.randomWeightSOH: select STORE_SOH,STORE_SOH_RAND_WGHT from saap.local_wow_soh where article='article_num'
TCName.weightSOH: select STORE_SOH from saap.local_wow_soh where article='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyDSCReportPDBArticle
TCName.countCigarettesDepartment: select * from sp_wow_article_display_for_dsc_basic ('{"iv_session_id":"","iv_sales_org":"1005","iv_site_no":"3064", "iv_date":"date1", "iv_flag":"UNACTIONED","iv_user_ids":"ALL", "iv_department_ids":"27", "iv_article_no":"", "iv_article_barcode":"","iv_barcode_flag":"","valid":"Y","deptNameStr":"dept_name"}') a,zwowc_article_master b,zwowc_article_listing c where a.article_no=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr
TCName.currentSOH: select STORE_SOH from saap.local_wow_soh where article='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyDSCReportLitreArticle
TCName.countLitreDepartment: select * from sp_wow_article_display_for_dsc_basic ('{"iv_session_id":"","iv_sales_org":"1005","iv_site_no":"3064", "iv_date":"date1", "iv_flag":"UNACTIONED","iv_user_ids":"ALL", "iv_department_ids":"45", "iv_article_no":"", "iv_article_barcode":"","iv_barcode_flag":"","valid":"Y","deptNameStr":"dept_name"}') a,zwowc_article_master b,zwowc_article_listing c where a.article_no=b.matnr and b.matnr=c.matnr
TCName.currentSOH: select STORE_SOH from saap.local_wow_soh where article='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportAllDepartment
TCName.PLUCode: select PLU_code from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER where matnr='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportPartialDepartment
TCName.PLUCode: select PLU_code from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER where matnr='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportForArticleNumber
TCName.articleDetails: select distinct a.MATNR,a.online_desc,a.PLU_CODE,b.EAN11 from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER a JOIN saap.zwowc_article_ean b ON (a.matnr=b.matnr) JOIN saap.zwowc_article_master c ON (b.matnr=c.matnr) JOIN saap.zwowc_article_listing d ON (c.matnr=d.matnr) JOIN saap.zwowc_article_uom f ON (d.matnr=f.matnr and b.ean11=f.EAN11)where a.PLU_code!=''

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportForArticlePLU
TCName.articleDetails: select distinct a.MATNR,a.online_desc,a.PLU_CODE,b.EAN11 from ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER a JOIN saap.zwowc_article_ean b ON (a.matnr=b.matnr) JOIN saap.zwowc_article_master c ON (b.matnr=c.matnr) JOIN saap.zwowc_article_listing d ON (c.matnr=d.matnr) JOIN saap.zwowc_article_uom f ON (d.matnr=f.matnr and b.ean11=f.EAN11)where a.PLU_code!=''

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportDeletedPLU
TCName.ALCStatus: select a.matnr,a.plu_code,b.alc_status_desc from saap.ZWOWC_ARTICLE_MASTER a,saap.zwowc_article_listing b where a.matnr=b.matnr and a.matnr='article_num'

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportMultiDepartment
TCName.multiDepartment: Select DISTINCT dept_name, cat_name, sub_cat_name, seg_name from saap.ZWOWC_ART_LIST_DEPARTMENT

TCName.name: verifyPLUReportPrimaryDepartment
TCName.primaryDepartment: select distinct dept_name from USR_PRIMARY_DEPTS where usr_id='user_id' and site='NONE'
